citation: Marine and Safety (Infringement Notices) Amendment Regulations 2023 (Tas)
text:
Marine and Safety (Infringement Notices) Amendment Regulations 2023

I, the Governor in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council, make the following regulations under the Marine and Safety Authority Act 1997 .

19 June 2023

B. BAKER

Governor

By Her Excellency's Command,

MICHAEL DARREL JOSEPH FERGUSON

Minister for Infrastructure and Transport

1. Short title
    These regulations may be cited as the Marine and Safety (Infringement Notices) Amendment Regulations 2023 .

2. Commencement
    These regulations take effect on 1 July 2023.

3. Principal Regulations
    In these regulations, the Marine and Safety (Infringement Notices) Regulations 2017 are referred to as the Principal Regulations.

4.
    The amendment effected by this regulation has been incorporated into the authorised version of the Marine and Safety (Infringement Notices) Regulations 2017 .

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 28 June 2023

These regulations are administered in the Department of State Growth.
